Brutality and Vigilante attacks of Hong Kong Police towards Unarmed Ordinary Citizens

Dear Sir/Madam,

I am writing to demand your coverage/attention to the brutality and extreme violence exerted to the ordinary unarmed citizens of Hong Kong by the Hong Kong Police on the 27th July, 2019.

On the 27th July, there was a peaceful protest in the Yuen Long District in Hong Kong. The protesters opposed against the Triads beating ordinary citizens in the Metro Station on the 21st July, and accused police of their indifference and non-action of this incident despite receiving thousands of emergency calls in 3 hours.

In this protest, the Police employed brutality towards unarmed peaceful protesters and ordinary citizens. This included firing tear gas to residential buildings, Metro Stations and elderly homes. More importantly, in the evening, hundreds of police entered the MTR station and used brutal force to beat the heads of unarmed peaceful ordinary citizens. Some were injured with blood. Some became unconscious.

The Police’s brutality and vigilante attacks reminded the people of Hong Kong the violence of the Triads on last weekend. The Police had lost their temperament. Not only are they no longer able to protect the lives of Hong Kong citizens, but also become the Triad members themselves to beat us.

I hope you understand that it is difficult to provide sufficient evidence due to the chaotic situation at the scene and the Police prohibiting reporters from filming their actions. Yet, please refer to the attached GIF for your follow-up actions. Thank you.

Yours faithfully,
